channel.title: NOWAY It can't be!?!?!?!
channel.description:
I really haven't thought of a good title so yes. Lets just get point of this. Jagex plans to create a new MMORG game called mechscape Thomas Woode's CV and Concept Art 3. John Seru's CV ("Lead modeller, for an online space mmorpg"). Has plan to create this project upon space. More INFO: http://mechscape.googlepages.com/ [b] 1 November 2007 - Behind the Scenes - November[/b]
We couldn't part from you without mentioning something very, very big on the horizon. The new year brings a stunning new update, and we are so happy with it that we are going to let a few hints trickle out over the next few weeks...
Jagex has registered the Trademark 'MechScape' according to government website. (Down at the time of posting). http://www.ipo.gov.uk/tm/t-find/t-find-adp?propnum=0820133001 With enought prove from links I am willing to say that I'm 50% chance right. http://www.youtube.com/v/AobrMEbvlE0&rel=1 Ripped [img]http://mechscape.googlepages.com/signup.jpg/signup-full.jpg[/img]

item.title: NOWAY It can't be!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:9, topic:158568”]Looks very nice, But what i hate to say is, many people will quit rs for it, and many people’s interest in mech will make jagex update RS slower.

Runescape + WOW = Mechscape…[/quote]Hahaha, why would Jagex struggle towards a shitty mmorpg like WoW? Runescape always intended to work as a MUD, and i’m sure it always will.

Read full topic

item.title: NOWAY It can't be!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:13, topic:158568”][quote author=kando2 link=topic=216086.msg1883003#msg1883003 date=1195194878]

Looks very nice, But what i hate to say is, many people will quit rs for it, and many people’s interest in mech will make jagex update RS slower.

Runescape + WOW = Mechscape…

No, RS 1000 years in the future = MechScape.

If the game is anything like the title suggests, all it will be is a futuristic version of RS, with most things like quests, CW’s, Duel Arena and all that will be in it.

It’s been said it’ll be more different like runescape,
hafe human and hafe robot.
And it’s going to be based on space (as I heard)
[/quote]

The name was unoriginal(MechScape, sounds like it came from moparscape), and it’s gonna have the same style graphics as RuneScape(aka, can run on crap computers relatively easily), unless the Jagex team can pull ideas out their asses along with knowledge of being able to implement them into the game, it will have all the features of RS tweaked into it.

For example, it will probably have a lame duel system, a sort-of lame CTF system with armor for rewards and other stuff, while lack things such as 64 person tournaments, “World trading”(I know this is being added into RS2 but damn, took it’s time), about 300 quests with 5 being useful.

See where I’m going?[/quote]
Not everyone has a high-end computer (like me)

Read full topic

item.description:
@kando2 wrote:

check out the links…

  1. The following domain names are registered to Jagex Ltd (verify with DomainTools):

mechscape2.com (2005-08-24)
mechscape.biz (2005-08-26)

mechscapecoin.com (2006-05-15)
mechscape.com (2003-12-15)

mechscape.us (2005-08-24)

mechhq.com (2006-05-15)

Edit: also http://mechscape.googlepages.com/
isn’t acutally the main site, it’s the fansite.

Looks very nice, But what i hate to say is, many people will quit rs for it, and many people’s interest in mech will make jagex update RS slower.

Runescape + WOW = Mechscape…

No, RS 1000 years in the future = MechScape.

If the game is anything like the title suggests, all it will be is a futuristic version of RS, with most things like quests, CW’s, Duel Arena and all that will be in it.

It’s been said it’ll be more different like runescape,
hafe human and hafe robot.
And it’s going to be based on space (as I heard)
[/quote]

The name was unoriginal(MechScape, sounds like it came from moparscape), and it’s gonna have the same style graphics as RuneScape(aka, can run on crap computers relatively easily), unless the Jagex team can pull ideas out their asses along with knowledge of being able to implement them into the game, it will have all the features of RS tweaked into it.

For example, it will probably have a lame duel system, a sort-of lame CTF system with armor for rewards and other stuff, while lack things such as 64 person tournaments, “World trading”(I know this is being added into RS2 but damn, took it’s time), about 300 quests with 5 being useful.

See where I’m going?[/quote]
Somewhat I agree

I bet it’s fake. MechScape, if that is really the name, would be so unoriginal.

I shared some disbelief as well, but the website actually has me somewhat convinced. Also, runescape wasn’t exactly too original either

I remember some listings on gamedev from jagex, looking for people to work on a new game of some sort though.

http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws?23,24,359,53196268 I’m too lazy to read through the pages(I’m not really interested in a new game), but maybe there is more information.
